lines.text: Tonight is Halloween - the night when witches, goblins and ghosts howl and shriek and scare the life out of people... but unlike the other ghosts is Casper. He doesn't want to scare people - he just wants to be friendly
[Lou takes off her mask and floats out of her dress]

[singing]
Found me a partner/Skip to My Lou/Found me a partner/Skip to My Lou/Feels so good since I met you/Skip to My Lou, my darling
